snippet: The Justice Department removed a Malaysian professor from the overbroad no-fly list after eight years of confounding litigation.
abstract: Editorial condemns United States government's continued denial of visa for Dr Rahinah Ibrahim, who was erroneously included on terrorist no-fly list and arrested at airport in 2005; decries Ibrahim's inclusion on terrorist-screening database, despite government admission that she has never posed threat, as both contradictory and violation of human rights.
lead_paragraph: The Justice Department removed a Malaysian professor from the overbroad no-fly list after eight years of confounding litigation.
